comments:
Build ID: I20070209-1006

Steps To Reproduce:
Sometimes when typing around in the filter text the exception is thrown.
It is not directly reproducible but occurred more than once (most often when deleting characters)

This is a really old build - Krystof is this a duplicate?

Failed part of code was remove in build I20070306 by fix patch to bug 172841. Before we get first element from content provider (contentProvider.getElements(null)[0]) array could have 0 elements) and mark it as selected in searched list. Now we set as selected first element from list (list.getTable().setSelection(0)). In conclusion this bug has been fixed since I20070306.
